jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
**Backend Developer
NO SALARY
EQUITY - 0.5%-2% 
BONUS and SALARY (AFTER SEED FUNDING)**

Want to work on the cutting edge and induistry changing Sports Analytics, Machine learning, and startup investing? ...us too.

Sponsorlytix is seeking a Backend Developer, who will work alongside the CTO and CEO and be a critical force behind Sponsorlytix's technology goals. More information about the company will be provided at a later stage to the shortlisted candidates. However, we have an exciting multi-year plan that will be shared to candidates that receive an interview. More details about our Group of companies can be found on www.dantaniinc.com

REQUIREMENTS:
- 3+ years of production coding experience 
- Good grasp of Mongo, Databases, Python, .NetCore, AWS cloud, API coding, Machine Learning and AI
- Good knowledge of API integrations. 
- A strong commitment to quality 
- Excellent problem solving and communication skills 
- A deep desire to build a lasting product and company
- Ability to take an ownership & leadership role on the team

TECHNICAL STACK:
- Mongo, Databases, Python, .NetCore, AWS cloud, API coding, Machine Learning and AI, MySQL, BitBucket, AWS...

NICE TO HAVE 
- Experience with Solidity Programming
- Experience with Data warehousing
- Experience integrating payment and financial platforms (e.g. Stripe, QuickBooks, etc.)
- Experience with DevOps

Benefits:

Bonus scheme
Profit sharing/share options

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description:
**Data Engineer
NO SALARY
EQUITY - 0.5%-2% 
BONUS and SALARY (AFTER SEED FUNDING)**

Want to work on the cutting edge and induistry changing Sports Analytics, Machine learning, AI? ...us too.

Sponsorlytix is seeking a Data Engineer who will work alongside the CEO development team and be a critical force behind Sponsorlytix's technology goals. More information about the company will be provided at a later stage to the shortlisted candidates. However, we have an exciting multi-year plan that will be shared to candidates that receive an interview. More details about our Group of companies can be found on www.dantaniinc.com

**About this role**

You will be working on the core algorithms of the software This means that you will look for creative, but methodically robust ways of identifying groups in various streams of data (more details will be provided later). You will design and execute experiments closely following the scientific method.

You should be able to design and perform experiments independently. We have a dev team that’s responsible for engineering of the data streams. You need to be able to code up experiments from A to Z and give clear instructions to the devs what data streams you need.

You will work directly with the founder, who is also working on the algorithm. You will be responsible for implementing the new algorithms and will be taking the lead in shipping these into production along with our dev team. You will make sure that all changes are properly documented. You will also be responsible for making sure that there are robust tests put in place to ensure data correctness. You will often communicate with engineers on our dev team and you will be able to request resources from this team.

You will have plenty of flexibility and you will be encouraged to try new things and think outside of the box. The only requirement is that you have to be able to defend the logic behind these ideas and provide a falsifiable methodology.

**Responsibilities**

Designing & running experiments for improving the algorithm
Testing to verify performance of these experiments
Identifying issues with the algorithm (e.g. monitoring for bugs, inaccurate results, false data inputs/outputs etc.)
Proposing potential solutions and methods for falsification
Communicating with the dev team
Making sure the algorithm is being implemented correctly
Making sure that the tests for data accuracy are sufficient and are running correctly
Writing documentation for the approved algorithm, but also for all experiments (both failed and successful)
Building simple machine learning models

**Requirements**

Good grasp on statistics
Good grasp on Probability Theory
Coding skills (preferably .Net, MongoDB etc)
AWS Databases experience would be good for database interaction
Experience working with stats programs (e.g. SPSS or R)
Development of APIs and Algorithms for frontend
Mathematical thinking
Relevant working experience

**Great to have**

The following interests are not required, but if you share some of them, you will find this role more exciting. You will be encouraged to explore these interests further and look for ways to bring them to your work and research.

Data engineering experience (working with Data APIs and Relational Databases, data cleaning and transformation)
Interest in Machine Learning; especially if you can build & train simple models
Familiarity and interest in Memetics, Information Theory, Graph Theory, Network Theory
Familiarity and understanding of Bitcoin network (especially the role of Proof of Work)
Familiarity and interest in Deep Learning

**How to Apply**

media@dantaniinc.com

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
**Frontend Developer
NO SALARY
EQUITY - 0.5%-2% 
BONUS and SALARY (AFTER SEED FUNDING)**

Want to work on the cutting edge and induistry changing Sports Analytics, Machine learning, and startup investing? ...us too.

Sponsorlytix is seeking a Full Stack Developer. The Full Stack Developer will work alongside the CTO and CEO and be a critical force behind Sponsorlytix's technology goals. More information about the company will be provided at a later stage to the shortlisted candidates. However, we have an exciting multi-year plan that will be shared to candidates that receive an interview. More details about our Group of companies can be found on www.dantaniinc.com

REQUIREMENTS:
- 3+ years of production coding experience 
- Good grasp of VueJS, Laravel, React.JS, Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript 
- Good knowledge of API integrations. 
- A strong commitment to quality 
- Excellent problem solving and communication skills 
- A deep desire to build a lasting product and company
- Ability to take an ownership & leadership role on the team

TECHNICAL STACK:
- vueJS, Laravel, Javascript, Node.JS, React.JS, Express.JS, TypeScript, MySQL, BitBucket, AWS...

NICE TO HAVE 
- Experience with Solidity Programming
- Experience with Data warehousing
- Experience integrating payment and financial platforms (e.g. Stripe, QuickBooks, etc.)
- Experience with DevOps
